item.title: Imperium Magazine
item.description: Paints I have … a thing … for paints. There are 25x12ml pots, 2x18ml pots and 4x24ml pots in the picture from the poster. Most came off of (or out of) this thread on FaceBook. So far 9x12ml and 1x24ml pots have been confirmed in upcoming issues. Another 7x12ml and 2x18ml are obvious from the pictures - assuming no “new” paints are created durring the magazine’s run.1 This leaves 3x24ml (which are kind of obvious) and another 9x12ml paints to guess at - but three of the 12ml pots look kind of obvious.

item.title: Mortal Realms
item.description: The Mortal Realms is a partwork magazine run by Hatchette for Games Workshop. Here, I’m collecting an list of the contents, rules and links to the individual items. ForbiddenPlanet sells the things, lets you pic-and-mix, ships internationally, ships sooner and can be cheaper than the producer … when you purchase at least 11 issues at once.1 symbol meaning - i have the issue / i have painted or otherwise digested the issue into my collection ; it’s a Stormcast issue and i’ve stupidly assembled the minis with no real plan Delivered Issue 01 ; The Age of Sigmar The Age of Sigmar
